_meta.source: Prima Strategy Guide (1999) via Claude Vision

objectives: Defeat Erika at Celadon City Gym
Get the Silph Scope from the Game Corner Hideout
Defeat Koga at Fuchsia City Gym
Pick up HM 03 and the Gold Teeth in the Safari Zone
Exchange the Gold Teeth for HM 04 with the Game Warden
Rescue Mr. Fuji from the Pokemon Tower
Give the thirsty guard a drink
Rescue the President of Silph Co. and receive a Master Ball
Defeat Sabrina at the Saffron City Gym
Get HM 02 from the house behind the bushes
Find the Secret Key in the Pokemon House
Defeat Blaine at the Cinnabar Island Gym
Defeat Giovanni, leader of Team Rocket, at the Viridian City Gym
Defeat the Elite Four, one right after another
Defeat your rival one last time
Get the Old Amber from the Museum's research facility
Talk to Pokemon Fan Club President
Talk to everyone in Department Store
Get the Eevee from Celadon Mansion
Get the Coin Purse from the Bar
Shop at the Celadon Department Store
Get the Silph Scope from Team Rocket's Hideout
Clear Team Rocket from Silph Co
Defeat Koga at the Fuchsia City Gym
Get HM 04 from the Game Warden
